data.name: 0000 (422.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What we ought to prioritize right now#W20―#W10―

data.name: 0001 (422.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Is keeping Miss Suzumiya away from this dangerous place.

data.name: 0002 (422.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It might satisfy Haruhi to eat something and fill herself up#W20…#W10…

data.name: 0003 (422.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't deny that such a simplistic idea crossed my mind.

data.name: 0005 (422.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A barbecue?#W30 Huh, that's not a bad idea coming from you.

data.name: 0006 (422.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As you can see, Haruhi jumped at the idea surprisingly easily.

data.name: 0007 (422.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: There's certain equipment we'll need if we're to hold a barbecue.

data.name: 0008 (422.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: And of course, a location.

data.name: 0009 (422.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We can just borrow that stuff from a club or an interest society.

data.name: 0010 (422.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi, that's not borrowing, you call that "taking at your own leisure."

data.name: 0013 (422.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I accidentally left my wallet in the school...

data.name: 0014 (422.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A-Asahina#W20…#W10…

data.name: 0016 (422.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Here…

data.name: 0017 (422.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, I don't think you can barbecue that?

data.name: 0018 (422.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: But...#W20 it has a high nutritional value.

data.name: 0019 (422.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...Right. If you think it's fine, I won't stop you.

data.name: 0021 (422.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: You're sure it's okay--having us lot join in?

data.name: 0022 (422.ja) TANIGUCHI (谷口)
data.value: Whoa! Asahina's hand cooking?!

data.name: 0026 (422.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kyon, the fire isn't lighting...

data.name: 0027 (422.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: O-okay! I'll do it--

data.name: 0030 (422.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wait, Nagato! #W20Don't cook that!

data.name: 0032 (422.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Look, Kyon!#W20 Come help out over here.

data.name: 0033 (422.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Gah!#W30 Just how hard are you planning to work me?!

data.name: 0035 (422.ja) TANIGUCHI (谷口)
data.value: I'm not kidding, Kyon!#W20 I saw a girl disappear!

data.name: 0036 (422.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A girl…#W20…#W20 It couldn't be... #W20from that time?

data.name: 0038 (422.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, coming from Taniguchi it's pretty hard to believe#W20…#W10…

data.name: 0039 (422.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well... #W20I guess we'll take a look.

data.name: 0041 (422.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Isn't that completely different to what Taniguchi said?!

data.name: 0042 (422.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Is this#W20…#W10…#W40 unrelated to Miss Suzumiya's desires?

data.name: 0043 (422.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In that case...#W40 Surely Miss Nagato would have noticed#W20…#W10…

data.name: 0023 (422.ja) KUNIKIDA (国木田)
data.value: Sorry we ended up getting involved, Kyon.

data.name: 0044 (422.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: About Haruhi
